entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Card 'Spring Breeze Bouquet'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Mother's Day Cards
Price: 23.75

Welcome a bright, cheerful burst of spring into someone's life with this special personalised handmade card. Perfect for numerous occasions, this card is sure to make your loved one feel appreciated. The main motif of the card is a colourful spring bouquet made from natural and artificial flowers, ribbon roses, dried grasses and faux greenery. Pick it up today to show someone special you're thinking of them this Mother's Day, Birthday or Easter!

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Birthday Card ‘Mellow Bouquet’
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Birthday Cards
Price: 23.75

This handmade birthday card is a wonderful choice to send all your love and warm wishes to someone special on their birthday. The design features a bouquet made from ribbon roses, dry grasses, artificial and real dry flowers. The whole arrangement is handcrafted with crystals, mini flowers and a lovely dusky pink bow.

The card comes in a lovely presentation box and can be personalised with own message on front and inside.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Greeting Card 'I Adore You'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 23.50

Striking and vibrant - this handmade card a great way to say ‘I Adore You’ to that special person in your live. The main feature of the design is a bouquet made from ribbon roses, dry grasses, artificial flowers and padded hearts. The whole arrangement is handcrafted with crystals, mini flowers and a lovely burgundy velvet ribbon bow.

This Valentines card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A4 Luxury Boxed Birthday Card ‘Rustic Meadow Bouquet ’
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Birthday Cards
Price: 43.95

A beautiful large luxury boxed card to celebrate a special birthday. The main motif of the design is a rustic meadow bouquet made form real dry grasses and flowers and tied with champagne chiffon ribbon with frayed edge. The card can be personalised with your own word on front and inside, making it suitable for numerous occasions. It is presented in a lovely box to add to the surprise.

entry.title: A4 Boxed Handmade Birthday Card ‘Heart of Daisies’
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Birthday Cards
Price: 42.50

Wish someone special a very happy birthday with our classy ‘Heart of Daisies’ luxury handmade card. It comes in a gorgeous grey box and is a really a stunning keepsake. It can be personalised with you own words of front and inside making it suitable for numerous occasions – birthday, anniversary or just because.

This 3D design boast the heart made from red and pink faux flowers and fuchsia padded hearts. The whole arrangement itself is gorgeously adorned with crystals and pink mini flowers. Large velvet burgundy bow with clear heart-shaped pendant in the middle complete this elegant design.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Birthday Card 'Make a Wish'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Birthday Cards
Price: 18.15

Our gorgeous rainbow shooting star handmade birthday card is just perfect for any kid’s special birthday. The card comes with a specially designed gift box and can be personalised with your own words on front and inside. This 3D card featurs sparkly glitter star with rainbow, mounted to the blue and gold paper frame, with white and blue padded clouds floating above. The whole arrangement is gorgeously hand-decorated with ribbon roses, pom poms, crystals and metallic stars. Large shimmering gold bow with blue ribbon rosette in the middle add dimension and complete this magical design.

entry.title: A4 Luxury Boxed Birthday Card ‘Rose and Velvet’
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Birthday Cards
Price: 40.50

An exquisite extra-large handmade birthday card. It is beautiful in every way from the design to the presentation box. The card boasts the flower arrangement made from faux pink rose flowers, greenery, ribbons and skeleton leaves. The whole arrangement is mounted to mother of pearl frame in the middle of the card. Sparkling crystals and small ribbon roses are scattered over the frame, and large shimmering pink bow with pink heart-shaped pendant in the middle complete this stylish design.

The card can be completely customised with your own words both on front and inside making it suitable for numerous occasions - birthday, anniversary, etc. It comes in a lovely presentation box with black velveteen frame.

entry.title: A4 Luxury Boxed Handmade Card ‘Just For You’
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 42.95

Send all your love to that special person in your life with this stylish extra-large personalised handmade card. Nothing says love more than a classic bouquet of red roses combined with lovely white gypsophila flowers. The whole arrangement is gorgeously handcrafted with crystals, red padded hearts and large shimmering red bow.

The card is presented in our signature luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside. It can presonalised with you own message both on front and inside, making it a perfect card for a loved one on Valentine’s Day, for birthdays, anniversaries, weddings and engagements.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Birthday Card 'Modern Bouquet'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Birthday Cards
Price: 21.95

Surprise your friends or family members on their birthday with this absolutely beautiful 'Modern Bouquet' birthday card that could not be any more perfect for the special occasion. The design featured the flower arrangement made from faux greenery and dried flowers, ribbons, pom poms, crystals, pink silk orchid and padded heart. The card comes in a keepsake gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Mother's Day Card ‘Bella'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Mother's Day Cards
Price: 22.50

Congratulate your Mum in a special way on Mother's Day or Birthday with this delightful and charming design made in soft pastel colours. Fully customisable with your own message both on front and inside, it will make a great present for any Mum, Wife, Daughter or Grandma.

The design features a bouquet made from three large pink ribbon roses, ribbons, faux greenery, natural bunny tails and dried flax. The whole arrangement is mounted to the raised white and lilac paper frame and handcrafted with crystals and small ribbon roses. The finishing touch is a large shimmering gold bow with pink heart-shaped pendant in the middle

This Mother's Day card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Birthday Card 'Floral Boom'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Birthday Cards
Price: 21.75

Wish that special person in your live a very happy birthday with this stylish handmade boxed birthday card.  It comes in our signature gift box and can be personalised with your own words on front and inside, making it suitable for numerous occasions - Birthday, Mother's Day, Anniversary, etc. The design boasts the flower arrangement made from a large burgundy silk vintage rose and purple camellia, cherry blossom petals, padded hearts, ribbon roses, ribbons, skeleton leaves and crystals.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Card 'Affection'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 22.85

A truly gorgeous card for your soul mate and love of your love on Valentine's Day, Birthday or just because. It is just perfect for two people who are meant to be together. Presented in luxurious gift box, it will make a really memorable keepsake.

The design boasts a bouquet made from three large red ribbon roses, burgundy ribbons, faux greenery red and red bunny tails. The whole arrangement is mounted to the white square frame and handcrafted with crystals and small ribbon roses. The finishing touch is a large black ribbon bow with multicoloured crystals and red heart-shaped pendant.

This handmade card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Birthday Card 'Ocean Song'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Birthday Cards
Price: 20.50

Wonderful luxury birthday card - just perfect to wish that someone special a very happy birthday. The design features ocean themed arrangement made from faux grey and white foliage, ribbons, spiral shells, beads and crystals and tied together with shimmering navy ribbon bow - the card which for sure will be appreciated by any recipient.

This birthday card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Personalised Handmade Birthday Card 'Magical Unicorn'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Birthday Cards
Price: 18.15

Designed in pink and lilac colours, our sparkly unicorn handmade birthday card is just perfect for a girl's special birthday, whether it is their 3rd, 4th, 5th or even 10th birthday. The card comes with a specially designed gift box and can be personalised with your own words on front and inside, making this card a truly unique gift for a Daughter, Granddaughter, Sister, Niece or Friend.

This 3D handmade card boasts sparkly glitter unicorn ornament, mounted to the pink and white paper frame, with pink and gold shiny padded clouds floating above. The whole arrangement is gorgeously hand-decorated with ribbon roses, pom poms and crystals. Large shimmering pink bow with pink ribbon rosette in the middle add dimension and complete this magical design.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Birthday Card 'Simply Beautiful'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Birthday Cards
Price: 22.50

Wish a Happy Birthday in style with this absolutely beautiful luxurious birthday card, designed in soft, dainty and gorgeous colours. Presented in our signature gift box and personalised with your own words, it will be a wonderful keepsake gift and will be kept and treasured throughout the years.

The main motif of the design the flower arrangement made from faux camellia flowers, greenery, ribbons and skeleton leaves. The whole arrangement is mounted to mother of pearl frame in the middle of the card. Sparkling crystals and small ribbon roses are scattered over the frame, and large shimmering pink bow with pink heart-shaped pendant in the middle complete this stylish design.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Handmade Card 'Elegance'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Mother's Day Cards
Price: 22.95

A lovely card to give to that special person in your life on their special day. It can be customised with your own personal message both on front and inside. Ideal for Birthday, Mother's Day or any other special occasion. The card comes in luxurious gift box with a black velveteen frame inside, making it a really unique and memorable keepsake.

The main motif of the design is a flower arrangement made from faux cream and pink camellia flowers, burgundy skeleton leafs and ribbons. The whole arrangement is mounted to mother of pearl frame in the middle of the card and handcrafted with knitted and wooden flowers, crystals, pom poms and burgundy satin bow.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Handmade Card 'Flowers and Butterflies'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Mother's Day Cards
Price: 18.95

What a beautiful card to tell Mum 'huge thank you' for everything she has done for us over the years and wish her a wonderful day. It can be personalised with your own greeting both on front and inside. Ideal for Mother's Day, Birthday or just because. The card come in our signature luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside. It will make a truly special keepsake that for sure will delight any Mum on her special day.

The design features print of purple lisianthus flowers bursting out of lilac envelope. The whole arrangement is gorgeously handcrafted with lilac ribbon roses, wooden flowers, crystals, colourful wooden butterflies and lilac and silver satin bow. Wooden butterflies come in a variety of colours.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Photo Card 'Loving You'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 21.85

A special card for a special person in your life - a great keepsake gift to give to the love of your life on Valentine's Day, Birthday or Ruby 30th Anniversary. Fully customisable with you own message - it is perfect for your girlfriend or boyfriend, wife or husband, lover or just best friend. The design will be personalised with your favourite photograph mounted to the purple paper frame in the middle of the design. The whole arrangement is gorgeously adorned with crystals, metallic and wooden hearts, roses, pom poms, wooden 'love' letters and burgundy satin bow.

This handmade photo card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Birthday Card 'Aqua Blue'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Birthday Cards
Price: 21.95

Designed in silver, white and turquoise colours, this stylish and delicate design will be a great card for sending your special birthday wishes for that special person in your life . Fully customisable with you own words and presented in our signature gift box, it will also make a great keepsake.

The design features an elegant bouquet made from ribbon roses, lush ribbons, and silver rose petals. The whole arrangement is mounted to the blue sakura frame and handcrafted with crystals, large blue satin ribbon bow and heart-shaped pendant.

This birthday card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Birthday Card 'Happy 21st Birthday'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio

Price: 18.95

A classy black and white 21st birthday card - just ideal to wish someone special a Happy 21st Birthday. It can also be personalised with any age on the front of the card. The design features number '21' printed in black colour with black and white paper balloons floating above it. The whole display also embellished with crystals, heart-shaped buttons, pom poms and ribbon roses. The card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

Dramatic, exotic and vibrant - this luxurious birthday card a great way to say Happy Birthday to that special person in your life. It is beautifully presented in luxury gift box full of silk gold rose petals with a black velveteen frame inside. The main feature of the design is a fancy peacock feathers bouquet with two large brown ribbon roses. The finishing touches are crystals, small ribbon roses, gold and green satin ribbons, gold petals and white ribbon bow.
